entry.title: Vite report on Sat, 19 Aug 2023 14:01:14
entry.summary:
Tech:
- How to change your Facebook password: Reset your password to keep your account safe
- Create a systemd service script for running Gunicorn to serve your application
- HPC-AI Tech Raises 22 Million USD in Series A Funding to Fuel Team Expansion and Business Growth
- Show HN: Saf – simple, reliable, rsync-based, battle tested, rounded backup
- Implementing CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions, and GitHub Pages in a React app.
- Xbox’s new “8 strikes” mod rollout judges hate speech 3x worse than cheating
- Bored Ape Yacht Club creator to block OpenSea in fight over payments
- Apple Loop: Massive iPhone 15 Pro Upgrade, Apple Watch X Surprise, Disturbing iPhone Launch Details
- Android Circuit: Galaxy S24 Ultra Leaks, Oppo Reno10 Pro Prize, Honor Magic V2 Secrets
- Elon Musk claims X users are about to lose an important safety feature—the ability to block trolls

Business:
- PFL Playoffs NYC 2023 Results: Larissa Pachecho Obliterates Olena Kolesnyk In 14 Seconds
- PFL Playoffs NYC 2023 Results: Marina Mokhnatkina Makes Quick Work Of Amber Leibrock
- One in 5 Chinese young adults looking for work is unemployed. The lack of work slows down the whole economy
- TSMC – the world's most important company. And everyone wants control of it
- Express is laying off 150 workers. Here's the full list of major retailers making cuts, from Gap to Walmart.
- Analysis: Health care CEOs hauled in $4B last year as inflation pinched workers

AI:
- To-MAY-To, To-MAH-To: Why Digital Technology And Innovation Are Not The Same Thing
- Meet CipherChat: An AI Framework to Systematically Examine the Generalizability of Safety Alignment to Non-Natural Languages-Specifically Ciphers

Other:
- One in 5 Chinese young adults looking for work is unemployed. The lack of work slows down the whole economy
- Russian soldiers are fighting Ukraine high on amphetamines, a report claims. The Nazis did it first.
- On Maui, a perfect storm of climate, colonialism, and failed emergency systems made the deadliest US wildfire in over a century
- Radiation Spikes at Chernobyl: A Mystery Few Seem Interested in Solving
- Mister Rogers had a point – routinely greeting six neighbors maximizes wellbeing
- Exactly Where To Book Now For The U.S. ‘Ring Of Fire’ Solar Eclipse
- Today’s Wordle #791 Hints, Clues And Answer For Saturday, August 19th
- New Shows And Movies To Stream This Weekend On Netflix, Hulu, HBO Max, Disney+ And More

Insights:
- The tech section covers various topics such as Facebook password reset, creating a systemd service script, funding for HPC-AI Tech, implementing CI/CD pipeline, Xbox's new mod rollout, and disputes in the NFT space.
- The business section includes results from PFL Playoffs, unemployment issues in China, the importance of TSMC, layoffs in Express, and the earnings of health care CEOs.
- The AI section discusses the difference between digital technology and innovation, as well as an AI framework called CipherChat.
- The other section covers a range of topics including global unemployment, drug use in warfare, wildfires in Maui, radiation spikes at Chernobyl, the impact of social interactions on well-being, and upcoming solar eclipse events.
- Overall, the report highlights the latest developments in the tech, business, AI, and other sectors, providing insights into various trends and issues.
